content: purl to last 4 sts k3 p1 repeat the last 2 row 14 15 15 16 more times this will give a total of 15 16 16 17 slipped stitches on each side to pick up for the gusset heel turn heel turn row 1 rs slip1 k16 17 18 19 sts ssk k1 turn heel turn row 2 ws slip 1 p6 p2tog p1 turn heel turn row 3 rs slip 1 knit to 1 stitch before last turning point ssk k1 turn heel turn row 4 ws slip 1 purl to 1 stitch before last turning point p2tog p1 turn repeat last two row until all sts have been worked but note that for the first and third size you will finish the last two row with a ssk and a p2tog you will now have a total of 17 19 19 21 sts remaining for the heel gusset **for the remainder of the sock the textured pattern will be worked across the instep on an odd number of stitches so that row 1 will end with a k1 and row 3 will end with a p1 on the next row knit across all your heel sts but do not slip the first st pick up and knit 15 16 16 17 sts along selvedge edge at side of heel one st for each slipped st place marker 1 m1 knit across the 31 33 35 37 instep sts as per row 3 of the textured stitch pattern place marker 2 m2 pick up and knit the 15 16 16 17 slipped sts along the other side of the heel place a temporary beginning of the round marker tbor here next round knit all stitches slipping the markers as you come to them gusset decrease round knit to 3 st before m1 k2tog k1 sm1 knit in the appropriate pattern row across the instep sts sm2 k1 ssk knit to tbor repeat these last 2 row till there are 29 31 33 35 sole sts remaining there will now be an unequal number of sts on each needle as the instep will have 2 more sts than the sole these stitches will remain like this till the start of the toe shaping at this point the tbor marker can be removed and the beginning of the round will now be at the beginning of the instep sts foot work as established knitting the appropriate pattern round across the instep sts until the foot measures approximately 1 75 1 75 2 2 4 5 4 5 5 5 cm from desired length and ending after round 1 or 3 next round knit 30 32 34 36 sts then return the last st on this needle to the sole sts so there will be an equal number of sts on both sides knit the remaining sole sts shape toe toe decrease round *k1 ssk knit to 3 sts before marker k2tog k1 repeat from * across sole stitches knit one
